name: MiniMaze (aerofloyd)
description:
MiniMaze is a bloodless slow downing online multiplayer first person shooter game (short: BSDOMFPS) inspired by the game classics Maze War and especially the wonderful Midi-Maze II by Markus Fritze back in 1989.

IMPORTANT: This is a public beta and currently in development. Sounds, music, effects, characters and especially graphics will be replaced and improved in future versions of this game.

Features:

  • Online multiplayer with up to 16 players (8 recommended)
  • 8 unique mazes in different sizes (5 original & 3 additional)
  • Dog-eat-dog-Mode
  • Team-Mode (up to 8 teams)
  • Spectator Mode (fly free through each maze and watch others playing)
  • 18 weapons / features e.g. Fast Shot, Faceless, Quick, HUD Map, Reflective Shot, Auto Answer, Invisibility, Walk Through Walls and more
  • Kill- / Game-Feed
  • Offline- / Solo-Mode
  • Quality & Screen Size Settings on the fly
  • Fullscreen Mode

And now grab some friends and have fun...

Your feedback is highly appreciated! Please post the good, the bad, the ugly and your thoughts in the comments and join the MiniMaze Discord: https://discord.gg/h4ftsSNNjy

Platforms:

Mac & Windows (Linux not tested, so it's up to you. Please leave a comment)

System Requirements :

Fast machine :-) Apple: M1 recommended

Future feature roadmap:

  • iOS-Build
  • New Input System with Controller Support
  • Advanced Game Mode
    • Additional features which are not part of Maze War or Midi-Maze such as Moon Jump, Target Lock and more
  • Time limited game mode
  • Time limited features
Change log Version 0.7b12 (current):
  • Fixed an issue where the player cannot see others on the HUDMap
Version 0.7b11:
  • Beta Release on Itch.io
  • AI Enemies: now available in multiplayer game, but still in development
  • Bugfixes
Known issues in Version 0.7:
  • AI Enemies can pick pickup items, but"Wall Shot" and "Walk through walls" are not implemented yet
  • Sometimes the AI Enemies can get a bit out of sync

Version 0.7b8:

  • Teams (finally, yippie!)
  • Lobby: now everybody can start a online game and create his own room
  • Lobby: see all currently running games and choose which you join. Name of the room, Maze and count of joined players are supplied as well
  • In-game: see the player ranking in your HUD, without opening the scoreboard (which has additional infos)
  • AI Enemies: play against NPCs (non-player characters) in Solo- / Offline Game
  • Bugfixes

Version 0.6b5:

  • Spectator mode: join a game as a free-fly visible (Drone) or invisible spectator and watch others playing
  • New Mouse-Movement with smoothing. Can changed while playing
  • Offline / Solo-Mode: play without starting a online game / connection and get familiar with the mazes or fight against AI Enemies
  • Changeable Screen-Resolution even while playing, now up to 4k (Pause Menu, saved as player preferences)
  • Changeable Quality-Settings even while playing (Pause Menu, saved as player preferences)
  • Kill-, Join & Leave-Feed
  • New Mid-Size-Mazes (Experimental): „Arbuthnot by the sea“ and „Hall of fame“)
  • Many bugfixes
